name: Colin George Pavelin
goal:
To provide consultancy services that support the development and implementation of policies in healthcare. The priority areas are cross-border healthcare, including cross-border genetic testing; rare diseases policy, encompassing the work of the European Reference Networks.

Other areas of expertise including advising on strategies in genetics and genomics in a healthcare setting, precision medicine and gene and cell therapy development in healthcare as part of the regenerative medicine and life sciences sectors.
interests: Education, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
